segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a dress and an apron, looking quite domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But something is very wrong with the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running continuously, pouring right over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a widening puddle on the floor, reaching her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet she shows no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely unaware of the flood happening around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a mess, and the water damage will be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder when she'll finally notice the disaster beneath her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside the window is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
